message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with topological analysis of scalar fields, which is a topic that falls under computational geometry (cs.CG) and computational topology (cs.DS). The use of k-nearest neighbors regression and local median filtering suggests a machine learning (cs.LG) approach to handling functional outliers. The use of distance to a measure for handling geometric outliers suggests a numerical analysis (cs.NA) approach. Finally, the combination of topological results with noise models suggests a statistical inference (cs.SI) approach.
